content: Hello! This is XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
Hi, I think I have a plumbing issue I need help with.
Thanks for letting me know. May I have your name, please?
Thank you, John. Could you please provide the address where the plumbing service is needed?
Checking if 123 Maple Street, Springfield is within our service area...
Great news, John! We can service your address. When would be an ideal time for our technician to visit?
Actually, Iâ€™m moving soon, so I don't want to spend money on repairs right now.

I understand, John. Moving can be stressful, and it makes sense to hold off on repairs. If you need assistance in the future at your new place, feel free to reach out. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
reason: Customer declined scheduling due to upcoming move
